variants.name: Not clickable
variants.notes: This card variant removes click focus from the whole card. This is to accommodate multiple links.

context.content: The default card is a single clickable element but this one allows individual elements to be clickable. This supports multiple links and actions.

variants.name: Borderless
variants.notes: This card variant removes border and padding. The card operates as a container for elements without the visual prominence. Combining with `health-card--clickable` allows the whole card to remain clickable.
